title: Good Omens Cast On Franchises And Fandom | NYCC 2018 | SYFY WIRE
author: SYFY WIRE
comment: I'm so far gone on loving Michael Sheen that I'm swooning over even little things like him adding that Jon Hamm's character is a new addition too. He's so thoughtful and generous. I'm supposed to be essay-writing but I'm like "just one more hit"..
5:28 ThRRRRIL-ling David with his scottish accent 😂
Heck yes! I love the idea of more Aziraphale and Crowley through the years. I'm even more amped. Though, no pressure.
It’s so rare that a TV series has MORE in it than a book! So I am REALLY EXCITED!  Oh my goodness >/////<
Anything that gives me more chaotic Crowley and his soft angel is fine with me
description: Good Omens cast Michael Sheen (Aziraphale), David Tennant (Crowley), Jon Hamm (Archangel Gabriel), Miranda Richardson (Madame Tracy) and director Douglas Mackinnon join writer Neil Gaiman on our live stage to discuss Good Omens, why they each choose to be a part of big name franchises and their first experiences with Gaiman's works.
